author: Martha Cruz
title: chevron-right
text: {p}We're starting the week with two WEATHER ALERT DAYS (Monday & Tuesday) for multiple rounds of mountain snow & valley rain in Southern Nevada...{/p}{p}TODAY: We'll see gloomy conditions with cloudy skies in Las Vegas throughout the day with bands of light to moderate rain showers moving in throughout the day. High temperatures will only reach around 55 degrees this afternoon with north winds up to 10 mph.{/p}{p}So far as of this morning around .08\" to .31\" of rain has fallen in the valley over the last 24 hours with higher amounts in the west valley & near Green Valley. Around .67\" of rain has dropped at Red Rock Canyon & Lee Canyon is reporting around 11.5\" of snow in the last 24 hours.{/p}{p}A WINTER STORM WARNING is in effect through 10:00 pm Tuesday for the Spring Mountains & Sheep Range above 6,000 ft for 1ft to 3 ft of snow possible. Lincoln County is also expecting to see several inches of snow with 8\" tot 16\" above 6,000 ft in elevation.{/p}{p}A FLOOD WATCH is in place through Tuesday afternoon for portions of southeast California & extends into portions of southern Nye County and far western Clark County. Around 1\" to 2\" of rain will be possible in areas like Indian Springs, Pahrump & Amargosa Valley.{/p}{p}TONIGHT: Skies will remain cloudy this evening with rain shower chances through the early evening and after midnight with valley low temperatures around 45 degrees.{/p}{p}YOUR 7 DAY: An atmospheric river is pouring abundant rain into the California coastline and pushing valley rain & mountain snow into Southern Nevada. Around 3\" to 4\" of additional rain will be possible along the coast in SoCal from this storm. Forecast rain estimates for the valley are around .75\" to 1.00\" for the storm total in the west valley and .50\" to .75\" for the rest of town from the entire storm through Tuesday. The wettest days will be at the start of the week with slight shower chances for the rest of the work week as a few additional storms move in.{/p}{p}By the time we reach the weekend drier weather is expected with temperatures around 54 degrees on Super Bowl Sunday at kickoff under sunny skies!{/p}{p}Check back for more updates & have a great day!{/p}{p}- Chloe Koast{/p}{p}It might have been a cold week in Las Vegas, but some local casinos are looking forward to the warmer days ahead.{/p}{p}Clique Hospitality will host a three-day job fair as they look to hire for the{ }DAYLIGHT Beach Club inside Mandalay Bay and the brand-new{ }Bel-Aire Backyard, opening inside the Durango Casino & Resort.{br}{/p}{p}Open interviews for model cocktail server positions will take place on{ }{ }Monday, January 15, while open{ }interviews for all other open positions are set to take place on{ }Tuesday, January 16, and Wednesday, January 17.{ }{/p}{p}All three events will take place from{ }10 a.m. to 4 p.m. at the{ }Bel-Aire Lounge inside{ }Durango.{br}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{ }{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/blake-sheltons-ole-red-shares-inside-look-ahead-of-grand-opening-on-las-vegas-strip#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/blake-sheltons-ole-red-shares-inside-look-ahead-of-grand-opening-on-las-vegas-strip#\"}{strong}Blake Shelton's Ole Red shares inside look ahead of grand opening on Las Vegas Strip{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}Positions include{ }cashier, cook, model barback, model bartender, model busser, model cocktail server, porter, runner, and security. Those in attendance will have the chance to{ }network among like-minded professionals, form connections, and pave their way into the position.{/p}{p}Applicants must be 21 years of age or older for the cocktail server, server, bartender, and barback positions. Applicants 16 or older are eligible for all other positions.{ }{br}{/p}{p}Candidates can also apply online for both {a href=\"https://www.cliquehospitality.com//bel-aire-backyard-careers\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.cliquehospitality.com//bel-aire-backyard-careers\"}{strong}Bel-Aire Backyard {/strong}{/a}and{ }{strong}{a href=\"https://daylightvegas.com/2024-auditions/\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://daylightvegas.com/2024-auditions/\"}DAYLIGHT Beach Club{/a}.{/strong}{/p}{p}We're starting the week with two WEATHER ALERT DAYS (Monday & Tuesday) for multiple rounds of mountain snow & valley rain in Southern Nevada...{/p}{p}TODAY: We'll see gloomy conditions with cloudy skies in Las Vegas throughout the day with bands of light to moderate rain showers moving in throughout the day. High temperatures will only reach around 55 degrees this afternoon with north winds up to 10 mph.{/p}{p}So far as of this morning around .08\" to .31\" of rain has fallen in the valley over the last 24 hours with higher amounts in the west valley & near Green Valley. Around .67\" of rain has dropped at Red Rock Canyon & Lee Canyon is reporting around 11.5\" of snow in the last 24 hours.{/p}{p}A WINTER STORM WARNING is in effect through 10:00 pm Tuesday for the Spring Mountains & Sheep Range above 6,000 ft for 1ft to 3 ft of snow possible. Lincoln County is also expecting to see several inches of snow with 8\" tot 16\" above 6,000 ft in elevation.{/p}{p}A FLOOD WATCH is in place through Tuesday afternoon for portions of southeast California & extends into portions of southern Nye County and far western Clark County. Around 1\" to 2\" of rain will be possible in areas like Indian Springs, Pahrump & Amargosa Valley.{/p}{p}TONIGHT: Skies will remain cloudy this evening with rain shower chances through the early evening and after midnight with valley low temperatures around 45 degrees.{/p}{p}YOUR 7 DAY: An atmospheric river is pouring abundant rain into the California coastline and pushing valley rain & mountain snow into Southern Nevada. Around 3\" to 4\" of additional rain will be possible along the coast in SoCal from this storm. Forecast rain estimates for the valley are around .75\" to 1.00\" for the storm total in the west valley and .50\" to .75\" for the rest of town from the entire storm through Tuesday. The wettest days will be at the start of the week with slight shower chances for the rest of the work week as a few additional storms move in.{/p}{p}By the time we reach the weekend drier weather is expected with temperatures around 54 degrees on Super Bowl Sunday at kickoff under sunny skies!{/p}{p}Check back for more updates & have a great day!{/p}{p}- Chloe Koast{/p}{p}It might have been a cold week in Las Vegas, but some local casinos are looking forward to the warmer days ahead.{/p}{p}Clique Hospitality will host a three-day job fair as they look to hire for the{ }DAYLIGHT Beach Club inside Mandalay Bay and the brand-new{ }Bel-Aire Backyard, opening inside the Durango Casino & Resort.{br}{/p}{p}Open interviews for model cocktail server positions will take place on{ }{ }Monday, January 15, while open{ }interviews for all other open positions are set to take place on{ }Tuesday, January 16, and Wednesday, January 17.{ }{/p}{p}All three events will take place from{ }10 a.m. to 4 p.m. at the{ }Bel-Aire Lounge inside{ }Durango.{br}{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 |{ }{/strong}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/blake-sheltons-ole-red-shares-inside-look-ahead-of-grand-opening-on-las-vegas-strip#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/blake-sheltons-ole-red-shares-inside-look-ahead-of-grand-opening-on-las-vegas-strip#\"}{strong}Blake Shelton's Ole Red shares inside look ahead of grand opening on Las Vegas Strip{/strong}{/a}{/p}{p}Positions include{ }cashier, cook, model barback, model bartender, model busser, model cocktail server, porter, runner, and security. Those in attendance will have the chance to{ }network among like-minded professionals, form connections, and pave their way into the position.{/p}{p}Applicants must be 21 years of age or older for the cocktail server, server, bartender, and barback positions. Applicants 16 or older are eligible for all other positions.{ }{br}{/p}{p}Candidates can also apply online for both {a href=\"https://www.cliquehospitality.com//bel-aire-backyard-careers\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.cliquehospitality.com//bel-aire-backyard-careers\"}{strong}Bel-Aire Backyard {/strong}{/a}and{ }{strong}{a href=\"https://daylightvegas.com/2024-auditions/\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://daylightvegas.com/2024-auditions/\"}DAYLIGHT Beach Club{/a}.{/strong}{/p}
